meanings.definition: Restricted or confined by the hooves
meanings.sent1: The hoofbound horse struggled to walk on the rocky terrain.
meanings.sent2: The farmer noticed the hoofbound cow limping in the field.
meanings.sent3: The hoofbound goat tried tap dancing but couldn't keep up.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts felt hoofbound, unable to wander freely.
meanings.sent5: The image of the hoofbound elephant stuck in my mind.

meanings.definition: Unable to move freely due to hoof-related issues
meanings.sent1: The hoofbound pony needed special shoes to walk comfortably.
meanings.sent2: The vet recommended treatment for the hoofbound donkey.
meanings.sent3: The hoofbound pig attempted a marathon but ended up in a trot.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were hoofbound, unable to explore new possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The concept of time felt hoofbound, always constrained by schedules.
